Package digital.ivan.lightchain.core.parser

Class SimpleAgentRoutedParser

java.lang.Object
digital.ivan.lightchain.core.parser.SimpleAgentRoutedParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOutputParser
public class SimpleAgentRoutedParser extends Object implements IOutputParser
Represents a simple parser for agent-routed outputs.

This parser specifically focuses on outputs with prefixed labels such as "Thought:", "Action:", and "Action Input:" to derive a ToolCall object representing the tool name and its input.

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public ToolCall parse(String output) throws OutputProcessingException
      Parses the provided output string to extract a ToolCall object.

      The output string should have prefixed sections identified by the labels "Thought:", "Action:", and "Action Input:". Any deviation from this format will result in an OutputProcessingException.

      Specified by:
      parse in interface IOutputParser
      Parameters:
      output - The output string to be parsed.
      Returns:
      A ToolCall object derived from the parsed output.
      Throws:
      OutputProcessingException - if the output format is invalid or unexpected.
